::Zardus::

Zardus looks around at the troops that were gathered around him, 
glancing at Havoc as he lands. The Chosen Ones still wern't there, but 
he could explain the plan to Deemos.

"Allright," he says, stretching out his arm. A small device emerged 
from his wrist comp, making a hologram of Hell Beast's old Predacon 
ship.

"Recently, there's been alot of activity around the Predacon base," he 
began, the hologram zooming in on scanner reports, "From what the 
scanners can say, they're doing something to the base, perhaps 
modifying it in some way."

The hologram zooms out, zooming in on the platform the Preds were 
building near the water. "At the same time, Predacons belonging to 
this same group are building a facility near the water, one that looks 
like a launching bay. Last time we met with this group of Predacons, 
it wasn't peaceful, and since these new developments are beginning 
right after the Alliance moved to the Iron Fist, which happens to be 
in water, there is a fairly high chance that they're building 
something in their base to use against the Iron Fist."

The hologram zooms further in on the platform.

"In any case, this platform is a large threat to us until we build 
underwater defences. Whether the Predacons are launching something at 
us from it or not, it needs to be exterminated."

He looks around at the bots, "Any questions so far?"
